short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a community-developed extension to support Awin Staff in their daily responsibilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Awin Helper is here to help you streamline your workflow. 

Now with support for those who care a bit less about the technical side of things.

Key tools like the New Implementation accelerator, Mastertag identifier and quick links to documentation based on the current site's platform let you get more work done in less time.

Version 2.0 is a major revision! With significant overhauls to its look, function and responsiveness, you'll find its easier than ever to ask for help.

See our GitHub for more detailed update notes.
